website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Republic of Gamers G20 is a small-form-factor gaming PC with enthusiast-level components and good gaming performance at a moderate price. However, some usability issues crop up when convention is sacrificed in the name of innovation and design.
cons: Difficult to open case and work with internal components
Eco Energy mode setup is overly complicated

customer_reviews.title: Strong pc, setup can be tricky but after that all good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this pc. Plays most games on high graphics settings. I will admit setup is annoying and maybe that's why some people are giving it negative reviews. Following other reviewers advice I did not upgrade to Windows 10 and to working fine. ***Make sure that you download the nvidia drivers manually as your graphics card won't be recognized otherwise and update the Asus bios. After that Restart, so that the drivers will work. After that should be good to go and happy gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Tamerlane

customer_reviews.title: I expect a great experience with Amazon and ASUS
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this pc. I expect a great experience with Amazon and ASUS. My intention is to update it on my own. I'll give details of the progress later. -After a week- I'm still impressive. Upgraded Original Memory Ram (Samsung 8GB PC3L-12800) to 16 (Kingston HyperX Impact Black 16GB Kit (2x8GB) 1600MHz DDR3L CL9 SODIMM 1.35V Laptop Memory), so now i can play Witcher 3 & Batman Arkham knight PC Game in Ultra Setting.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This problem was easily fixed but buying a DVI to HDMI adapter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just recently bought the i7 model and I must say I am impressed. The only problem I had with it is that when I first got it i was running the display through the hdmi out. I installed some required updates and the update stopped my display through the hdmi. This problem was easily fixed but buying a DVI to HDMI adapter and has run perfectly ever since. This pc runs everything great, Photoshop, illustrator, ark, CS , skyforge, you should have no problems with demanding graphics. All in all I give a 4 star because of the trouble I had at the beginning but the pros definitely out weigh the cons.
customer_reviews.author: Christian E.

customer_reviews.title: Great pre build for the money wtg Asus
customer_reviews.text: Well it has been about 3 months shy of a year now. that I have had my i7 and idk about all the other's. who have had trouble with there desktop. but I could not be any more happier with my purchase. this computer has taken everything I can throw at it game wise and has ran it. with out any issue that I can see other then. I like to see a better video card but even for a Gtx 760. still not bad I would buy this desktop again hands down glad I got it .
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He is very happy with it. Has no difficulty with any of the games he plays.
customer_reviews.author: B. Spee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Served me well for a year then died on me
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: I love the PC
customer_reviews.text: I love the PC, worked like a dream for the first couple months, but then I made he mistake of upgrading to windows 10, it gave me the black screen of death and I still not have been able to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic computer. I can pretty much do anything I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic computer. I can pretty much do anything I want on this and it won't experience any sort of lag.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer with great specs and build
customer_reviews.text: Great computer with great specs and build. Super compact and useful. Runs 200-300 FBS on hardcores games even in high setting.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came incomplete from Amazon no warranty papers, no mouse and no installation disc.
customer_reviews.author: Evan C. Dekeyser

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this last Tuesday on the 8/11/2015. I only update the system to window 10. Lost alot of proformace in gaming . i did a system factory reset , back to window 8. See no problem so far. Stay away from window10 til they fix all the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Duc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only have some little problems at the beginning of using and then everything is ok.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ITS AWESOMe! RUNNING DOTA ON 4K FPS 4K GRAPHICAL RESOLUTION AND TRI FANE POWER SUPPLY
customer_reviews.author: Frankie R.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed on how much trouble this has given me with ...
customer_reviews.text: Has barely been able to connect to the internet in my home since I've bought it, through both the wifi and an ethernet connection. Downloading at less than 100 KB constantly as opposed to my two year old labtop that can get a solid 1.5-2 MB on the same connection. I'm at a loss as to where to even start trying to find a fix for this. Very disappointed on how much trouble this has given me with how much the price was.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT make the mistake
customer_reviews.text: Constant crashes with driver issues, 8.1 windows bugs with the 760 so stupidly how could a fix not have been made yet? Crashes everytime playing high graphics games. Please save yourself the trouble of getting it delivered all the way to your location only to return it. This is the first time I have ever wrote a scathing review but trust me it is well warranted
customer_reviews.author: Jeet Khakh

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: Cool appearance, good performance, if you can change your GTX980 graphics card is good. Delivery speed is fast
customer_reviews.author: Luhua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice computer. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: and this computer shows a significant lag comparing to the good situation when I first receive it
customer_reviews.text: This is the third month I've been using it, and this computer shows a significant lag comparing to the good situation when I first receive it. And one IT-friend nicely gave me a reminder that the hardware of this computer may be broken more or less already.
customer_reviews.author: Ruo Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great design and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Great performance/lagless. Fast boot up. Handles gaming at 3440x1440 with ease. Customizable lights are an awesome feature. If you're looking for a compact gaming PC that can be placed on your desk this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: The machine is fast and quiet. Only gripe is ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine is fast and quiet. Only gripe is Windows 8.1 (prefer Windows 7) and some bloatware such as McAfee.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Z.

customer_reviews.title: The seller gives me Intel HD Graphics 4600 instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller gives me Intel HD Graphics 4600 instead of GTX 760. I hope I can get a clear explain.
customer_reviews.author: Yiming Chen

customer_reviews.title: some bad language may be found within
customer_reviews.text: Asus has hurt me and my family. For details.. click this imgur link [...] Warning.. some bad language may be found within. but you will hear how asus has not only been unethical, they have broken the law. I recommend amazon reps read this imgur post.
customer_reviews.author: anya smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for almost a month :( Bad GPU!
customer_reviews.text: starters the MB is great and the hdd works good. Boot times are fast. Cooling for cpu is good. The real fault here is that the Nvidia gtx760 is faulty and crashes after a short while. Called nvidia, spoke with tech rep, seems they have had issues with this gpu for a while now since late 2013. Their tech rep said its either a hit or miss with this gpu sadly mine is a miss. I will be returning this since opening the shell can void warranties. Wish I could replace but Amazon only will refund. I will try again with this little bundle. Works great and very powerful! For Bf4 and Titan wow!
customer_reviews.author: Midgardexplorer

customer_reviews.title: weird looking pc
customer_reviews.text: i like the actual computer! hardware wise yeah... totally an upgrade from my old hp.. but the software!!! WOW really REALLY miss my HP!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tinkles

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: This machine does not come with any NVIDIA Graphics card even though the software is present on the machine, and the NVIDIA sticker is on the side of the machine. Nor did this machine come with an 8Gb SSD. I contacted Amazon for a refund and was sent another machine. It was exactly the same as the first. When you call Asus, this machine never shipped with anything other than the Intel onboard graphics chip. Don't waste your money or time, IMHO
customer_reviews.author: David G. Wilson

Latest 4th generation Intel Core i7-4790 3.60 GHz processor
Fast peformance with 8GB DDR3 memory and large 1TB HDD and 8GB SSD Hybrid for extra storage needs
Immerse yourself in astounding visuals with NVIDIA GTX 760 GPU
802.11 AC with Bluetooth 4.0 for faster web browsing . Enrich your life with the latest Windows 8.1 OS
